Title: Miracles from Heaven
Overview: When Christy discovers her 10-year-old daughter Anna has a rare, incurable disease, she becomes a ferocious advocate for her daughterâ€™s healing as she searches for a solution. After Anna has a freak accident and falls three stories, a miracle unfolds in the wake of her dramatic rescue that leaves medical specialists mystified, her family restored and their community inspired.
Tagline: How do we explain the impossible?
Cast: Jennifer Garner, Kylie Rogers, Martin Henderson
